author: Eleanor Doughty
title: The most relaxing spa days for aches and pains
text: If you're feeling sore and a little out of sorts, then a gentle dip in a spa might be the best thing for you. Not only can spas be curative for aches and pains, but they can also work wonders for your mental wellbeing . A little bit of time away, in the peace and quiet can do a world of good. The UK is packed full of health spas that promise to send you home feeling light and breezy, but which one to try out first? These are our favourites - the most luxurious and most wonderful, perfect for easing away your stiffness and soreness. Scotland The grand Stobo Castle, set deep in the Scottish Borders is surrounded by pine forests and Japanese water gardens for a super calm feeling on arrival. Photo: Kenny Martin With a hydrospa, mud room and torch-lid hot tubs, you're spoilt for choice with the 80 treatments on offer. The perfect Scottish break. Stobo Castle Health Spa, Stobo, Scottish Borders EH45 8NY | stobocastle.co.uk North of England Tucked away in an ancient barn on the 33,000 acre estate of Bolton Abbey, the pool, spa spaces, steam room and cold water plunge pool makes Devonshire Spa just the ticket. Photo: The Devonshire Arms Enjoy a massage, manicure, pedicure or a soothing facial, or just simply bob around for a swim in the pool. The Spa at The Dev, Bolton Abbey, Skipton, North Yorkshire, BD23 6AJ | devonshirespa.co.uk London Photo: Grace Belgravia A womens-only spa retreat in the heart of central London, Grace Belgravia is the world away from the outdoors that you've been craving. At the Grace spa nature is the first on the list, with thermal mineral water, purifying algae and essential oils and herbs to boost your emotional, physical and mental wellbeing. What more could you ask for? Grace Belgravia Health Club & Spa, 11c West Halkin Street, Knightsbridge, Greater London SW1X 8JL | gracebelgravia.com Midlands In the Leicestershire countryside, Ragdale Hall is one of the most luxurious health spas in the country. Photo: Ragdale Hall With 12 heat and water experiences, a volcanic salt bath and whirlpool spa amongst other relaxing rooms, you're spoilt for choice at Ragdale. Ragdale Hall Spa, Ragdale Village, Melton Mowbray, Leicestershire LE14 3PB | ragdalehall.co.uk South East Just one hour from London, Grayshott Spa is well catered for with its 36 treatment rooms, hydrotherapy pool and indoor and outdoor tennis courts. Photo: Grayshott Spa You'll leave feeling refreshed, relaxed and calm. Unmissable. Grayshott Spa, Headley Rd, Grayshott, Hindhead, Surrey GU26 6JJ | grayshottspa.com South West Photo: Elliott White At Budock Vean Health Spa there's plenty to do, from invigorating massages, to salt glows, to blissful facials. All of that, in a delicious setting on a bend of the tranquil Helford River in Falmouth, complete with 65 acres of gardens. Just lovely. Budock Vean, Mawnan Smith, Falmouth, Cornwall TR11 5LG | budockvean.co.uk telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegoodlife
